Question: Later that afternoon, flowers arrived at this person's house with a note reading, "Happy Birthday, Kid.
Hints: In 1966, Lucille Ball became a friend and mentor to this person.
In 1954, during her junior year, a professor invited this person and some other students to perform at a black-tie party.
When **** awoke on the day of her 56th birthday in 1989, she discovered via the morning news that Ball had died.
